title: Product

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Calculate (Night, 2 use): Choose two players. You will receive the product of both of their post numbers.
- Powers of 2 (Night, 2 use): Choose a player. You will receive the product of their post number and a random power of 2 up to 256.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will not be informed which power of 2 your target's role was multiplied by when using Powers of 2.

desc:
Post 1018
*What is the product of number 1 and number 2? A right mess.*
